Params: {2: 'Celica', 3: "The frame's special configuration has been fully awakened. All signal tactics available for use!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I didn't think she could do it.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Transmit the new combat configuration to the Gray Raven Commandant, on the priority channel!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "At this sync rate, the frame's combat abilities will not be a problem. The real problem is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The decay rate of the remaining memory data?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The system will shut down when all memory data is lost. It is unavoidable, irreversible. If even one enemy is left standing when that happens...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I may not know where I am, or where you are.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Light as a feather, the heavens within reach.'}
{3: 'With renewed strength coursing through my frame, I punch through the gap held open by my companions. With the tower as my destination, I leap for the skies.'}
{3: "There, at the top of the tower, is everything I've ever longed for."}
